mapper.insert: insert into route (routeID, routeName, startProvice, startCity, endProwince, endCity, midProwince, midCity, transportPrice, Comment) values (#{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startprovice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endprowince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midprowince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update route set routeName = #{routename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startProvice = #{startprovice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startCity = #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endProwince = #{endprowince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endCity = #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midProwince = #{midprowince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midCity = #{midcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transportPrice = #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where routeID = #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select routeID, routeName, startProvice, startCity, endProwince, endCity, midProwince, midCity, transportPrice, Comment from route where routeID = #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select routeID, routeName, startProvice, startCity, endProwince, endCity, midProwince, midCity, transportPrice, Comment from route
